bibl.title: Polish Excavations in the Basilica at Marea (Egypt).
bibl.note: Polish Archaeological Mission, 2003-2005. - [Introduction]. - Occupation levels. - The apse. - Pastophoria. - Kiln for amphoras. - Baptistery. - North wing of the transept. - Altar and cancelli. - Main entrance of the basilica. - The chapel. - Latrine. - Rooms for industrial activities. - Exchange office.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.seg: SZYMANSKA Hanna and Krzysztof BABRAJ, Polish Excavations in the Basilica at Marea (Egypt).
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 45 (2006) pp. 107-117, 4 plans (dont 1 plan dépliant) et pll. XI-XIII.
